seller_description: Whiskas Adult Wet Cat Food, Chicken in Gravy, provides 100% complete and balanced nutrition for cats over 1 year of age. This high-moisture food is easy to eat and digest, supporting your cat's hydration needs. Made with real chicken, it offers a delicious gravy texture and aroma that appeals to even the fussiest eaters. Packed with vitamins, minerals, and quality protein, it promotes healthy muscles, while Omega-6 fatty acids and Zinc support a healthy skin and coat. Antioxidants help strengthen your cat's natural defenses, ensuring overall health and vitality.
review: This has to be the worst delivery I've seen in my life. The box has a rotten stench, the packets were open and there were maggots! This was traumatic. Threw the complete box, hopefully replacement won't be same.
expected-output: The seller describes Whiskas Adult Wet Cat Food as a nutritious and hydrating meal for adult cats, promising 100% complete and balanced nutrition with benefits like a healthy coat, better digestion, and enhanced muscle health. However, the buyerâ€™s experience was highly negative, citing severe delivery issues with open packets, a rotten stench, and maggots in the product, leading them to discard the entire package. The fault lies with the seller for not ensuring proper handling and delivery conditions, leading to a disappointing customer experience
